import React, { useContext } from 'react' import {GlobalState} from "../../../GlobalState" import {Link} from "react-router-dom" function Cart(){ const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [ cart]= state.userAPI.cart console.log(cart) if(cart.length ===0) return

Cart Empty

return (
{ cart.map(product =>(

{product.title}

{product.product_id}
${product.price}

{product.content}

{product.description}

Sold: {product.sold}

Buy Now
)) }
) } export default Cart
